overview: The film mainly tells the story of the male protagonist who is experiencing a mid-life crisis. In order to obtain the inheritance left by his father, he has to complete the one-stop career of marriage and childbirth in middle age. Thus staged a funny, nonsensical black absurd drama. The film stars young actors Tu Yuwei and Long Yiyi. Zheng Jiayu, the head of the first generation of pure jade girls in Taiwan, starred in strength
title: Strange Will
